Student Volunteer Abroad

Woodberry Forest School

Volunteered in a Nicaraguan education and language/cultural exchange program in Estelí, Nicaragua. Lived with a host family within a fully-immersive Spanish language-learning environment. Minimal English exposure for the duration of the trip during non-teaching hours. Taught English as well as general school subjects to children aged 5-10. Took hours of daily, intensive Spanish-language courses. Performed manual day labor to improve local infrastructure. Met the National Nicaraguan Wrestling team with my professors!
